class.name: commander.tasks.knowledges.EscortPrisonersToPosition
class.description: The knowledge of the 'EscortPrisonersToPosition' mission. This knowledge is used by the commander agent to perform this mission.

method.name: getReachable
method.description: Returns the main objective of the mission (the disembarking position).

method.name: getElements
method.description: Returns the prisoners units to take into account.

method.name: getNbrFront
method.description: Returns the number of first line units. This implementation returns the value of '1', meaning that only one unit will take prisoners into account.
